metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10871 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Poppler 0.74.0. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function PSOutputDev::checkPageSlice at PSOutputDev.cc.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this is an invalid read of size 1. Upstream fixed this issue by enabling SPLASH_CMYK in poppler.  Enabling SPLASH_CMYK introduced a regression in xpdf and gdal. See bug 1905741.

criterions.comment: poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
